mdRecord.dcterms:title: Laurel Branch Church Cemetery, Courthouse District
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Administered and maintained by the Laurel Branch Church of the Brethren, the cemetery is located about 1/2 mile south of the church on Laurel Branch Rd. NW. It is visible on Google Earth.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
